roleset.name: attach
roleset.note: BAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'band' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 22.4, 22.3-2. (from band.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: always band together?
example.text: [Many of the companies]-2 are even dropping their traditional independence and trying *trace*-2 to band together to create some sort of standard.
example.arg: to create some sort of standard

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Stewart is optimistic about the species population, and with his banding of dozens and dozens of birds each year, he knows that there is more to find out about this hawk that is called "the Urban Bird."
example.arg: of dozens and dozens of birds
